definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: As an observer to this culture, it seems generally trivial and trying.
sentences.chinese: 本片作爲這種文化的觀察者，便顯得瑣碎及令人煩厭。

sentences.english: But that might be possible here now: Someone could habituate a troop of drills to humans and start a long-term study.
sentences.chinese: 猴羣對人類一點都不害怕，觀察者可以進行長期研究。

sentences.english: Black holes are dense, but their event horizons preclude observations.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞密度足夠高，但是他們的視界阻止了觀察者。
他是位無偏見的觀察者。

sentences.english: About a decade ago, observers of the malaria situation had one positive comment.
sentences.chinese: 大約十年前，瘧疾狀況的觀察者曾有一個積極的評論。

sentences.english: Becoming an observer is a key to innovation.
sentences.chinese: 成爲一名觀察者是改革創新的關鍵。

sentences.english: At least that's what some China-watchers are betting.
sentences.chinese: 至少一些中國觀察者是這麼斷言的。

sentences.english: The observers were told the reward was completely random.
sentences.chinese: 觀察者被告知，這次獎勵完全是隨機的。

sentences.english: The reservoir in the reserved preserve is an obstacle to the obstinate observer.
sentences.chinese: 預留保護區內的水庫對固執的觀察者是一個障礙。

sentences.english: The idea seems promising, and Rosenberg is a perceptive observer.
sentences.chinese: 這個想法似乎前途，羅森堡是一個敏銳的觀察者。

sentences.english: “The observer is biased, ” Loveland said. “That's one possibility.
sentences.chinese: 觀察者帶着偏見，“拉弗蘭說，”那是一種可能性。

sentences.english: The idea is to make the viewer rethink his or her original ideal.
sentences.chinese: 這個想法是使觀察者重新思考他或她原來的設想。

sentences.english: The expected observer count is 1. The observableButton is declared as follows.
Choose turning the sports section of the observer into a gunners fanzine.
sentences.chinese: 選擇把“觀察者”的體育部分變爲槍手的球迷雜誌。

sentences.english: Some analysts thought these interactions were a form of integration.
sentences.chinese: 這些互動易讓觀察者以爲本區域正走向區域國際整合。

sentences.english: The watcher node can be any machine containing the SCOM agent.
sentences.chinese: 觀察者節點可以包含任何機器SCOM代理。

definition: to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
